website_summaries.verdict: Although basic and small, this Philips TV is easy on the budget and offers nice sound and picture quality, proving that good things sometimes do come in small packages.
pros: A standard 24-inch TV that is great for small spaces, bedrooms, or even recreational vehicles
Owners are impressed with the picture and sound considering the small size and low price
cons: Cord is on the short side

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, even if it had been more expensive.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little TV! Perfect size for my office, sharp-as-a-tack picture, great sound, light-weight, simple to set up, and so far has had no problems at all. I've had it a little over a month. If it does develop a problem any time soon, I know Amazon will stand behind it as they have any other problem I've had in my long and frequent order history. As far as shipping, it came earlier than expected and was packed to withstand bumps and jars in mailing. Very satisfied customer here.
customer_reviews.author: GracieMae

customer_reviews.title: Picked one up from Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Picked one of these up for my garage from Walmart and was very surprised. Vibrant picture with solid darks. Looking into it the screen is backlit so it doesn't have light bleeding in from the edges. My only complaint is the built in speakers are weak. Overall a great value for the money. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chargeit

customer_reviews.title: Very good but wall mounting screws too low
customer_reviews.text: Also picked one up at Walmart. Initial impressions are very good. Screen is excellent and speakers are good too. The only issue I found was that the wall mounting screws found on the back of the tv are lower than normal. If you already have a wall bracket installed then the TV ends up a few inches higher on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Ostinato

customer_reviews.title: Best 24 inch tv for Gaming and Movies especially Retro Gaming at 240p
customer_reviews.text: I got this TV as a birthday/Christmas present from Nana. I was pretty impressed with the colors & picture for a 720p display. But once I got it to usual picture setup, it was perfect. I have yet not seen any wrong bit color. I do use the Marseille Mcable gaming edition for my consoles all the time so I get all the benefits from it. And those who wonder if this TV is perfect for retro gaming? YES IT IS so sit back and enjoy your Playstation and Nintendo consoles as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shipley Green

customer_reviews.title: Virtually very low sound
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the size of this television. I use it for my monito, but the sound is horrible. I actually have to use a headset to listen to anything on this TV.
